metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12778 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The UI Lock feature in qBittorrent version 3.3.15 is vulnerable to Authentication Bypass, which allows Attack to gain unauthorized access to qBittorrent functions by tampering the affected flag value of the config file at the C:\Users\<username>\Roaming\qBittorrent pathname. The attacker must change the value of the "locked" attribute to "false" within the "Locking" stanza. NOTE: This is an intended behavior. See https://github.com/qbittorrent/qBittorrent/wiki/I-forgot-my-UI-lock-password.

criterions.comment: qbittorrent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
